## blockRendering.ExternalValueInput class

An object containing information about the space an external value input takes up during rendering

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ExternalValueInput extends InputConnection 
```
<b>Extends:</b> InputConnection

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ExternalValueInput` class.
